diff_hunk:
@@ -7,13 +7,12 @@ void THNN_(AbsCriterion_updateOutput)(
            THCTensor *input,
            THCTensor *target,
            THCTensor *output,
-           bool sizeAverage,
-           bool reduce)
+           int64_t reduction)
body: okay. Ideally here should have some comments saying `reduction` is an Enum so it will be easier for our future porter of THNN. But there are way too many instances. So idk if I should ask you to make this change.
